item.description:
Woodbridge Walk/Hike at Darling House
Saturday, August 11, 10:30 AM

Join us Saturday, August 11. The walk/hike is from 10:30 a.m. until about 12:30 p.m., along an easy, shaded, trail and will be followed by an optional lunch at a nearby restaurant. Please bring drinking water to the hike. We will meet at the parking lot adjacent to the Thomas Darling House. Please arrive by 10:30. Well-behaved pets are welcome. Directions are below.

This event will be canceled in the event of rain. If in doubt about the weather, contact Manny Ratafia: e-mail: manny@ratafias.com, hm 203-387-7348, mobile 203-901-9553 or Marsha Zellner hm 203-393-2816, mobile 203-494-3856.or Nina Stein hm 203-757-2539, mobile 203-215-0022.
Directions:

http://www.woodbridgehistory.org/

Thomas Darling House
Amity & Woodbridge Historical Society
1907 Litchfield Turnpike, Woodbridge, CT 06525

From either direction on the Wilbur Cross Parkway (Route 15) take Exit 59 for the Litchfield Turnpike (Route 69). At the end of the ramp take a left, and stay on Route 69 for 2.7 miles. The Darling House will be on the right (see the picture on the main page for an idea of what it looks like). After passing the house and shed, there is an entrance for a large parking lot on the right.
item.name: Woodbridge Walk/Hike at Darling House
